de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.transport

Interface TransportConnectionBuilder<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the underlying transport object
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SocketTransportConnectionBuilder

    public interface TransportConnectionBuilder<T>
    Generic TransportConnectionBuilder to create a TransportConnection with an underlying transport object (e.g. Socket).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TransportConnection toConnection(boolean selfInitiated, boolean server, T underlying)
      Creates a TransportConnection with the given parameters and a generated ID.
      TransportConnection toConnection(String id, boolean selfInitiated, boolean server, T underlying)
      Creates a TransportConnection with the given parameters and a defined ID.

    • Method Detail

      • toConnection

        TransportConnection toConnection(String id,
                               boolean selfInitiated,
                               boolean server,
                               T underlying)
        Creates a TransportConnection with the given parameters and a defined ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the definied ID.
        selfInitiated - the parameter, which identifies, if the connection was initiated by this side
        server - the parameter, which identifies, if the connection is a server connection
        underlying - the underlying transport object (e.g. Socket)
        Returns:
        the TransportConnection

      • toConnection

        TransportConnection toConnection(boolean selfInitiated,
                               boolean server,
                               T underlying)
        Creates a TransportConnection with the given parameters and a generated ID.
        Parameters:
        selfInitiated - the parameter, which identifies, if the connection was initiated by this side
        server - the parameter, which identifies, if the connection is a server connection
        underlying - the underlying transport object (e.g. Socket)
        Returns:
        the TransportConnection
